Detailed Description

Condition variable for single and multi-thread synchronization.

Condition variables can be used to coordinate activities. These variables are level triggered in that a condition can be signalled prior to another thread waiting. Condition variables can be used when single threaded but and will call mprServiceDispatcher to pump events until another callback invokes mprWaitForCond
